name: Chase Mushroom (Mini-Game)
description:
ChaseMushroom  is a mushroom character who is made for the GDKO game jam ChaseMushroom is the caretaker of an army of little mushrooms. This is a demo to show off the character. 

Now in Round 2 introduces an element for the character to interact with. I also added a menu and a new mode.

Music: www.bensound.com

Controls:

Arrow keys to Move 

Spacebar to Jump

Enter to Summon and to respond the ball

Backspace to Reset
